name: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: Legend
description:
Follow Lara down a path of discovery as she travels the globe to remote,
exotic locales in search of one of history’s greatest artifacts that
unleash unwelcome figures from Lara’s mysterious past. With guns
blazing, Lara must use her athletic ability and intellectual wits to
explore vast, treacherous tombs, riddled with challenging puzzles and
deadly traps. Experience the beginning of the new Legend in the most
adrenaline-fueled Tomb Raider adventure ever!
